name: Napali
description:
Namaste!

Akhila, from Andromeda X32 planet became aware of what her planet's army's next move is. They want to run experiments on every single human for their next weapon, a nanotech shape shifter. Akhila knows how much destruction it can cause to Earth and decides to revolt against her army. They discard her sense of empathy and throws her in jail, taking away all of her nanotech powered abilities. She manages to escape from the prison and makes her way to the closest space station, Atari 107. She plans to go to earth and warn the humans on a spaceship. But she realizes that the nanotech fuel batteries which powers the rocket are not put in place. Meanwhile, the space station commander of Atari 107 realizes the presence of Akhila and inititiates the turrets to kill her. Help Akhila to collect the batteries and put it back into Rocket's charging points to reach Earth.

Controls-

Use W and S to acclerate and decelerate, respectively.
Move mouse left and right to steer in the respective directions.
Use LMB near a battery to grab it using Akhila's Telekinesis powers but beware, her body's health depletes while using this power.
Use RMB while holding the battery to launch the battery in the camera's direction.
Use Mouse Wheel Up and Mouse Wheel Down to bring close or push away the battery while Akhila is using Telekinesis.
Use Left Shift to enable hovercraft's boost. This can come in handy when lot of turrets are targeting you.
